评论详情: I ordered these for my sister to try on and she is typically a medium in loose clothing like sweats, but this 2 piece set was too big for her liking. I recommend you to size down unless you are looking for a baggy fit. Color is a true black so be sure to wash with dark colors for the first time! The set arrived a bit wrinkly but can be smoothed out with proper washing and drying. The inseam is 29", so for shorter girlies the pants will drape over your shoes. Overall, decent set with average pricing for the material.

This set was perfect! I typically wear black, so when I saw this I had to have it. The color is a true black that hasn’t faded through multiple washes. It’s so comfortable and fit exactly as expected. I was surprised at how warm the pants were, making it a great option for those chilly fall and winter nights. Overall this is a great value that I highly recommend!

评论概述: Flattering and Comfortable Set for Everyday Wear
评论详情: I love how flattering this two-piece set is! The pants fit perfectly and have a nice amount of stretch, while the top is soft and fits just right. The colors are vibrant, and the material feels durable yet comfortable. I’ve worn it for a few casual outings and even to run errands, and it’s just so easy to throw on while still looking put together. If you’re looking for a versatile, comfortable outfit, this one is a winner!
It is already cold in NY already and thus has become a staple in my home wardrobe already. It is undeniable nice enough to be worn out too. It is thick warm and cozy.

Get ready to turn heads with the Blaosn Cute 2 Piece Sets Outfits for Women. The wide-leg cargo pants are the star of this set, offering both comfort and style. They fit like a dream and are perfect for lounging or running errands. The crop sweatshirt, however, is a bit of a mixed bag. While it looks trendy, the jacket is stiff and lays a bit weird. The collar has a mind of its own, popping up if you leave it unzipped. But let’s not forget the zippers—they’re blingy and add a touch of sparkle to your outfit. This set is a cute shopping outfit for those warmer winter days when you want to stay cozy but still look fabulous. Despite the quirks of the jacket, the overall look is trendy and fun. So, if you’re looking for a stylish and comfy set, the Blaosn 2 Piece Outfit is worth a try!

Very aesthetic matching lounge set.  I ordered this for traveling in the fall or colder months. The pants are comfortable and have 2 outside cargo pockets, with additional two inside. The length is past the ankle and the bottom is wide cut. The waist is high rise with a wide band elastic that is easy to wear all day.The seaming shows good quality stitching around. The overall material is soft and can be worn with a long sleeve body suit underneath.  The jacket zipper works well and the crop cut is longer.  The set is versatile.
Set is sporty and stylish. Comfortable. Fits perfectly and well made. Thick material but attracts lint

Perfect 2pc sweatsuit, not heavy but thick enough for fall and winter. I ordered the white and it is so bright and pretty. It’s very soft and I like the fit. I ordered a size M because I wanted it to be loose. It is loose and the Small would have fit fine as well.  All pockets are intact, I love the enclosure for the zipper on the jacket as well.

This two-piece set is both cute and extremely comfortable. The material's thickness is perfect - neither too thick nor too thin. I appreciate the comfort and style it provides. However, the medium size I ordered was slightly too big on the bottoms, so I suggest sizing down. The color is vibrant, easy to clean, and retains its hue.

This "sweatshirt" set isn't classic sweatshirt material.  It is smooth fabric not thin but not really thick either.  It has stretches like spandex.  The jacket has a pocket on one sleeve.  The pants are classic cargo pants style.  I ordered a size medium.  I am 150 lbs and 5'6 and it fits perfectly.

I love the fit and material. The color is a bit always. Can’t tell if it’s yellow, cream beige or I don’t know it’s weird. But the style, cut, fit and material are great. Pick a color that’s the true color this color is confusing.
This suit is cute and comfortable. It fits well and the material is a good, thick quality. The color matches the photo well. It is a good purchase.

My daughters favorite tracksuit. She says that is very modern and comfy. Its thickness will keep you warm and definitely are not see through. Will fit perfectly even if you get a smaller number. The colors are soft and very modern and pretty.

I have been absolutely loving these cute 2 piece women's outfits that I purchased, which consisted of wide leg cargo pants and a matching cropped sweatshirt. I opted for size S and I must say that they fit my daughter perfectly. Not only are these outfits stylish and match perfectly, but they are also very comfortable, perfect for both workout and loungewear. My daughter loved them from the first moment and they look fantastic on her. I would definitely recommend this set to anyone looking for comfort and style in one piece.

评论概述: Cute and Comfortable 2 Piece Lounge Set
评论详情: I am so pleased with this cute 2 piece outfit.  The grey color is beautiful, and the material is so soft and smooth.  The cropped jacket is very stylish and flattering.  I like the stand up collar and full zip styling.  The pants are nice as well, the wide leg is flattering and I am always a fan of pockets and there are 4 pockets on these pants.  Win!

This is probably the most comfortable comfortable sweatsuit set I’ve ever worn. The material is thick and very, very soft. I like that the jacket is cropped and that there are cargo pockets on the pants. It fits true to its size, however, the pants do run a little bit long. Other than that, I am happy with this purchase.

The Blaosn Cute 2 Piece Sets Outfits are a perfect blend of style and comfort! The wide-leg cargo pants are not only trendy but also incredibly comfortable, making them great for both lounging and casual outings. The crop sweatshirt complements the pants beautifully, creating a chic look that's ideal for workouts or everyday wear. The fabric is soft and breathable, ensuring you stay comfortable all day long. Plus, the matching set is easy to mix and match with other pieces in your wardrobe. Overall, this sweatsuit is a stylish choice for anyone looking to elevate their loungewear collection!

This set is so cute and it’s very stylish, and different than a lot of other tracksuits as this has the cropped sweatshirt and the cargo pants. It’s also very comfortable (fabric is 46% Rayon, 50% Polyester, 4%Spandex).  As for fit, I usually wear a size medium (6-8) but I went for a large in this because I don’t like feeling too tight in those sorts of waistbands, plus I usually size up in outwear, and I love the fit. This is a great winter outfit and I highly recommend!

评论概述: Cute set sizing is strange to me though
评论详情: This set is thick, durable, and relatively comfortable. The only thing that’s a little off to me is that the top feels more loose than the pants and I can’t explain it any other way. It still looks cute but I feel like the pants should either be more baggy style like the top or vice Versa.

This is a great basic sweat suit with some Style crop top and cargo pockets head to the style of this sweat suit without making it look like pajamas. You can dress it up or keep it casual I'm 5'1 so I will still need to him but very cute when you don't feel like dressing up to go out and the material is super soft

I got this set and I immediately liked it but then noticed something odd. The top is EXACTLY as described I honestly didn't even notice the pockets on my sleeves until I looked at a photograph. Any way the bottom ruined it because whomever made MY PANTS did the pockets backwards meaning when you stick your hand inside your hand usually goes forward towards your toes but NOT THESE your hands go back towards your buttocks. Now if that were the only problem I might've scored these as a 3-4 but the part with the string is obviously the back of the pants and the back with a label is clearly meant to be oriented towards the front. Since the assembler couldn't get the pieces on the pants in the correct order I now can't wear these without hearing did you put those on backwards? Due to that.. I cannot recommend this garment

评论概述: Great but not for cold weather
评论详情: The matching crop sweatshirt and wide-leg cargo pants are incredibly stylish and comfortable. The fit is perfect, and the fabric is soft and breathable. I love the attention to detail in the design, from the drawstring waist on the pants to the cute ribbed cuffs on the sweatshirt.  While the set is perfect for lounging around the house, I found that the fabric isn't particularly warm. It's great for mild weather, but you might want to layer up if it's chilly outside. Overall, I highly recommend this set for anyone looking for a stylish and comfortable outfit.
fits perfect - not too long!

This was actually very good quality material. I keep ordering everything large because I forget I’ve lost some weight so this time I went with a medium. I will say the medium is still a little bit on the top but since I am curvy and have wide hips the medium bottoms fit perfectly.  It’s a very very comfortable outfit, it’s cute and again the material is amazing and soft.  I will be wearing this often. I love lounge sets!

This set is really soft and comfy, but surprised me a little when it arrived. First off, the almond color is actually post-it yellow. It also fits a bit large, I should have gone one size down. It’s not a traditional “sweatpants” material, it’s that kind that is soft in the outside and has that stretchy, silky-ish texture inside. The waistband is wide and really high quality. Overall, they aren’t what I thought they would be, but are still cute and comfy.
